column1: Smoque BBQ////Fat worth having. Forget the sides
column2: eat a salad earlier in the day
column3: this should be a meat only meal. This small specialty bbq shop apparently always has a line but it moves quickly. Once inside
column4: the humid smoky smell of roasting meat hits your nose and the anticipation of tender
column5: juicy meat consumes all thought processes. With an assortment of baby back ribs
column7: I made myself a custom napkin bib and rolled up my sleeves to indulge in this decadent meal. The brisket was my favorite and the bbq sauce was spicy
